description:
I needed to test a regular expression and found this tool. Highlighting each match group in a different colour is a nice touch.

One potential improvement would be an incremental match mode, to help debug why a regular expression doesn't match a text it is expected to match, but I was able to fake this by deleting bits of the regular expression by hand. Undo & redo support in the regex entry field would have made this easier.
summary: Does exactly what it says on the tin

description: The basic feature works, you can test regexes. Much polish is needed though: there are broken icons, more regex engines would be nice and a way to replace matches.
